MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the PA13 & PA14 postcode area of Kilmacolm, Port Glasgow & Greenock. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:45pm to complete repairs to a faulty transformer at Bogside & restore the network back to normal and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2pm on the 29th of December 2020.
